# [Interview #465: TGS Signing Report - Lexington, KY, Entry #10](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=465#10)

#### Harriet McDougal Rigney

Harriet indicated that the 'bloodwrasps' mentioned in
*The Gathering Storm*
is not a typo of 'bloodwasps' and is a new thing we haven't seen yet.
